name: Menace
effect: The players collectively discard two spells that are in hand or prepped. The players collectively place two gems from their hands on top of their decks.

name: Glyph Enigma
effect: Persistent: Gravehod suffers 1 damage. If the nemesis tier is 2 or higher, Gravehold suffers 2 additional damage.

name: Gravity Splinter
effect:
To Discard: Spend 7 Æ.

Power 2: Unleash twice. The player with the fewest opened breaches suffers 3 damage.

name: World Purge
effect:
To Discard: Spend 9 Æ.

Power 2: Unleash three times. OR Gravehold suffers 7 damage.

name: Decimate
effect: Unleash twice and any player gains 2 charges. OR Gravehold suffers 4 damage.

name: Spirit Cage
effect:
To Discard: Discard a card in hand that costs 5 Æ or more.

Power 3: Unleash twice. Any player discards a spell in hand.

name: Baneful Crux
effect:
To Discard: Discard two cards in hand that each cost 4 Æ or more.

Power 2: Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 3 damage.

name: Negate
effect: Unleash twice. Any player destroys their most expensive card in hand. OR Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 3 damage.

name: Gallowskulk
effect: The player with the lowest life suffers 3 damage.

name: Unmake
effect: Unleash twice. Any player destroys the top three cards of their deck and suffers 3 damage.
